short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: One-click download of pictures on all websites for SVG and PNG etc.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance your image downloading experience with the Image Downloader Chrome Extension! Streamline the process of gathering images from web pages by easily bulk downloading them in just a few clicks.

Are you tired of individually saving images one by one? Our user-friendly Chrome Extension simplifies this task, making it ideal for graphic designers, content creators, and anyone who frequently collects images for projects, inspiration, or reference.

Key Features:
1. Effortless Bulk Downloads(Coming Soon): Save time and energy by selecting multiple images on a web page and downloading them all at once. No more right-clicking and saving images individually!

2. Intuitive Interface: Our user-friendly interface seamlessly integrates into your Chrome browser, ensuring a smooth and intuitive experience for users of all levels.

3. Customizable File Naming(Coming Soon): Organize your downloaded images effectively by customizing the filenames. Choose from various naming conventions to suit your preferences and maintain order in your collection.

4. **Selective Downloads:** Don't need all the images on a page? Easily cherry-pick the ones you want, and skip the rest. Efficiently curate your image collection as you go.

5. Multiple Format Support: Download images in formats that suit your needs, such as JPEG, PNG, GIF, and more. Maintain the image quality you desire without any hassle.

6. Quick Access: Find the Image Downloader extension icon conveniently placed in your Chrome toolbar. Access it whenever you need it with just a click.

7. Lightweight and Secure: Our extension is designed to be lightweight, ensuring it doesn't slow down your browsing experience. Your privacy and security are paramount; this extension does not collect any personal data.

Upgrade your image gathering workflow with the Image Downloader Chrome Extension. Never again worry about the tedious process of saving images individually â€“ save time, stay organized, and supercharge your creative projects. Download the extension now and revolutionize how you collect images from the web!
